::: Marine, Transanulas, Pheniox, and Gremlin look alive. Gremlin throws a 
few pistols to the others, and Pheniox leaps behinde the autocannon. 
Transanulas, who was by the computer, raises the shiled generator they had 
brought. It would by them some time. :::

:: Marine, holding a small missle launcher ::: Ha! A battle! I knew they 
would strike!

::: Marine targets Shuko, while Gremlin gets Serpentor, and Transanulas get 
Anubis, and Pheniox within the cannon fires at Hades. :::
